segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely unaware of the water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how she doesn't notice the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on that plate, drying it with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried watching the boy stand on that wobbly stool, it's not safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really reaching for the jar, and the stool looks like it could tip any second, which would be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched for a cookie, she seems so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been doing this without getting caught, they must be good at being sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet, it's quite surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay and no one gets hurt, that would be a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR
